SEARCH
Package org.Logic

Class CollisionDetector

java.lang.Object
org.Logic.CollisionDetector
public class CollisionDetector extends Object
Contains logic for checking and detecting collisions between player and tiles as well as player and immovable objects.

    • detectTile

      public int detectTile(MainCharacter player)
      Detect collision between the main character and any tiles they are currently touching.
      Parameters:
      player - the main character
      Returns:
      the tile type the player is touching, corresponding to the indices of tileTypes[] in TileManager

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the type of immovable object collided with, corresponding to indices in rewards[] in Screen
